name: Bounce (itch) (CharlieD_Dev)
description:
Bounce Goal

Avoid the bullets and survive as long as possible!

How To Play

General

Don't get hit by your own bullets, your bullets will bounce off everything except you, avoid them at all costs!

HUD

The bottom left is your health

The bottom right is your magazine, when it fills up (10 bullets, a bullet a second) your magazine drops, and bullets fall around you.

Movement

Left click to shoot in the opposite direction you want to go.

Info

This game was made in processing for the bullet hell game jam. I used proccesing.js  to run the processing sketch in the web (sadly, it didn't support audio). Have Fun!
